_comment: This is a sample JSON file. Anything starting with an underscore (like this _comment) should be ignored. Please always use comments to explain your JSON clearly to your marker
_ballboySizeComment: Your main character can be normal or large. What pixel dimensions these match can be up to you.
_ballboyPosComment: ballboy start at the x and y position indicated. This must be a positive double.
_cloudVelocityComment: Clouds should move the given number of pixels per second. This must be a positive double. This is not a required feature but we leave it here as a sample only for students who are interested in this feature.
